name: Abstract Utopia
description: A study of color through non-states and radical project’s flags. From the colors of the prism to the absence of color. From the Plurinational “Whipala” to the Anarchist black flag. Formal abstraction and radical politic’s symbols in one animation. This work was projected at the 5th International 1 Minute Videoart Festival at Cuenca - Spain in 2019. José Ramírez Guaigua
